content: @BorisMann There is no mention in the docs for ReactXP to support other desktop environments, the docs clearly say: > Other platforms such as Windows 7 & 8, MacOS, and Linux can be targeted using a web wrapper solution like Electron. ReactXP is built on top of React and React Native, neither of which are natively supporting desktop, so I don’t see ReactXP extending into that space anytime soon. You’re, of course, better off using React + Electron for multi-platform desktop support since ReactXP doesn’t even support Windows 10 / UWP yet; so your options would be to wait (if you’re only interested in Windows 10 support), or use Electron. I also don’t see how you’d use React Native with Electron.
